ygData.subject: ExtractorHTML and character entities
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there, I have a question in regards to ExtractorHTML and character entities. It looks like ExtractorHTML is not capable of resolving any character entity

Subject: ExtractorHTML and character entities

Hi there,

I have a question in regards to ExtractorHTML and character entities.  
It looks like ExtractorHTML is not capable of resolving any character 
entity but ampersand -- that is, it will look for instances of & and 
turn them into &, but will not resolve anything like ' or numeric 
character entities such as „ or  

Is this right, and if so, is this the correct behaviour?

Will.
